html:
Jan 5 (Reuters) - Stellantis NV STLA.MI And Amazon AMZN.O:

  • COLLABORATES WITH AMAZON TO DEVELOP CUSTOMER-CENTRIC CONNECTED EXPERIENCES ACROSS MILLIONS OF VEHICLES

  • SOFTWARE SOLUTIONS TO BE DEPLOYED IN STLA SMARTCOCKPIT, NEW DIGITAL COCKPIT PLATFORM TO BE LAUNCHED IN 2024

  • GLOBAL, MULTI-YEAR AGREEMENT INVOLVES AMAZON DEVICES, AMAZON WEB SERVICES (AWS) AND AMAZON LAST MILE

Further company coverage: STLA.MIAMZN.O


(Reporting by Gdansk Newsroom)
